divs: Sighting DetailsAs I was walking up my hallway this morning, I looked up at my cathedral windows and noticed a giant bright object at about 50deg in the eastern sky. It remained there for about 30 minutes and disappeared. About the only way I can describe it is it looked like the largest, brightest star I've ever seen and I'm an astrologer.
Summary: Very large bright object hovering In eastern sky.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Gastonia
There were no other sightings in Gastonia on or around July 2nd 2009
